org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.layers.recurrent

Class KerasLstm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.KerasLayer
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.layers.recurrent.KerasLstm

  • public class KerasLstm
extends KerasLayer
    Imports a Keras LSTM layer as a DL4J LSTM layer.
